Board games introduction: Play board games online with your friends. Only best games in a single place.
Update your player name: We already generated a cool name for you. You can change it anytime together with other settings by clicking on user icon in the header.
Find a game or create a new one: Find a game or create a new one on 'Games' tab.
Invite your friends to play with you or: Invite your friends to play with you or fight against the artificial intelligence.
